original_title: Amazing savings up to 75% for Pan Asia credit/debit Cardholders this festive season
original_body_lines: The end of each year is a much-anticipated season with hope, excitement, and plans for a wonder holiday by all. Gearing up to fulfil the hopes and dreams of its credit/debit card customers, this year too, Pan Asia Bank –The Truly Sri Lankan bank, has a range of exciting offers for its credit/debit cardholders for the upcoming festive season. Accordingly, Pan Asia Bank credit/debit card customers can enjoy the season of giving and sharing, with fantastic discounts of up to 75% on all kind of shopping from Clothing and Accessories, Hotels & Restaurants and Lifestyle with every swipe of their Pan Asia Bank credit/debit card.

Pan Asia Bank’s cardholders can enjoy these discounts over 200 leading merchants, local and international lifestyle brands across all the categories making it affordable to buy gifts for loved ones. enjoy well earned family getaways at several leading hotels in Sri Lanka or dining out with loved ones at leading hotels and restaurants.
